devdoc.details: This contract allows two users to deposit tokens into escrow, play a game off-chain, and have the winner receive the funds minus a fee.

AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

Deposited(address,uint256,uint8,uint256).details: Emitted when a deposit is made.

params.escrowType: The type of the deposit (ETH or ERC20).
params.user: The address of the user making the deposit.

MinEthRequiredUpdated(uint256,uint256).details: Emitted when the minimum ETH required is updated.

Released(address,uint256,uint256).details: Emitted when funds are released to the winner.

params.amount: The amount released to the winner.

constructor.details: Constructor that initializes the contract with a specific ERC20 token, fee, and initial owner.

params._escrowToken: The address of the ERC20 token to be used in the escrow.
params._minEthRequired: The minimum amount of ETH required for gas.

depositEth().details: User can deposit ETH, which will be tracked in the contract.

depositToken(uint256).details: User can deposit ERC20 tokens, which will be tracked in the contract.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to deposit.

getActiveEscrows().details: An escrow is considered active if the funds have not been released.

returns._0: activeEscrowIds An array of active escrow IDs.

params.escrowId: The ID of the escrow to join.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.recipient: The address to send the recovered funds to.

releaseFunds(uint256,address,string).details: This function can only be called by the owner.

params.escrowId: The ID of the escrow to release.
params.gameData: The data from the game that was played.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: GameEscrow

getActiveEscrows().notice: Retrieves the IDs of all active escrows.

joinEscrow(uint256).notice: Allows the second user to deposit the same amount and token type as the initial escrow.

recoverFunds(address).notice: Allows the owner to release any stuck or unclaimed funds to an address of their choosing.

releaseFunds(uint256,address,string).notice: Releases the escrowed funds to the winner.

updateMinEthRequired(uint256).notice: Updates the minimum ETH required for transactions.
